approveStacking(uint256).details: use of a delegate call to pass the stacking address as argument for approve function

params.amount: the ERC20 token amount to approve for the stacking contract

deposit(uint256).details: set a deposit lock by computation of the deposit value with interests at the unlock date and verification when calling withdrawPending

params.amount: the desired amount to deposit by the user

getAdrClients().details: usefull as relay for sending the client addresses to a borrow.sol contractcould be useless if it is possible access directly to the contract variable

getTotalVotingPower().details: it represents total summed xDeposit of every client

getUser(address).details: usefull as relay for sending the client properties to a borrow.sol contract

getUserDeposits(address).details: usefull as relay for sending the client total deposit in x value to a borrow.sol contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setFundingProject(address).details: the address is set by borrow contract before setting it here

params.borrowAddress: the address of the wining project funding in borrow contract

setStackingAddress(address).details: could be upgraded by using an stacking interface ?

params.contractAddr: the address of the stacking contract

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateXprice(uint256).details: view function usefull for interest computation

params.date: a epoch time to add at the current time to fetch x value in the future

returns.x: the value for a given date

wantWithdraw(uint256).details: fetch the differents deposits eligible for withdraw and delete them from the client array if withdrawn

params.withdrawAmount: the desired amount to withdraw by the user

withdraw(address).details: fetch the differents pending withdraws from the differents user and pay them

params._address: the IERC20 token address in use to payback the users

approveStacking(uint256).notice: allow the user to send ERC20 to the stacking contract

deposit(uint256).notice: make a deposit by the user in the staking contract

setFundingProject(address).notice: Define the project address to receive donations and funds

setTokenAd(address).notice: Define IERC20 token address accepted as deposit

updateXprice(uint256).notice: fetch the value of x, give actual value if argument equal to zero

wantWithdraw(uint256).notice: make a withdraw request by the user

withdraw(address).notice: make an effective withdraw for the user by the contract owner
